description:
These trousers are built for winter adventures that demand unrestricted movement, warmth, durability, and protection against the elements. Articulated knees and an elasticated waistband enhance your mobility, and adjustable leg endings effectively keep snow at bay.

  • Recycled nylon, polyester and elastane blend with a PFC-free DWR for weather resistance
  • Four-way stretch fabric is both durable and gives full freedom of movement
  • Soft, warm, stretchy fabric with a brushed interior
  • Articulated knees let the pants move with you
  • Two hand pockets, and leg pocket keeps essentials close by
  • Adjustable leg endings with cinches to keep snow out
  • Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: Fjallraven Abisko Winter Stretch Trousers - Women's
